revised_title: Applications of Ultra-High-Sensitivity Mass Spectrometry with Accelerators in Earth Sciences
tldr: This article discusses the use of ultra-high-sensitivity mass spectrometry with accelerators in various Earth science applications, such as studying soil erosion, sediment transport, and the history of erosion. The technique allows for more accurate measurements and a better understanding of these processes, providing valuable information for researchers and scientists.
scientific_discipline: Earth Sciences > Soil and Sediment Analysis
